tasks.test: deno task test-basics ; deno task test-imports ; deno task test-control-flow ; deno task test-functions ; deno task test-advanced
tasks.test-method-chain-call: deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ../doc/examples/traditional-method-chain-invocation.hql && deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ../doc/examples/dot-access-method-chain-invocation.hql && deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ../doc/examples/hql-dot-notation-showcase.hql
tasks.test-basics: deno task test-type && deno task test-class && deno task test-enum && deno task test-binding && deno task test-stdlib
tasks.test-imports: deno task test-import && deno task test-import2 && deno task test-extreme-imports-simple && deno task test-circular-deps && deno task test-ts-import && deno task test-circular-simple
tasks.test-control-flow: deno task test-cond && deno task test-loop
tasks.test-functions: deno task test-function && deno task test-return && deno task test-method-chain-call
tasks.test-advanced: deno task test-compile && deno task test-front-end-transpiler
tasks.test-circular-simple: deno run -A ./src/common/clean-cache.ts --force && deno run -A ./cli/transpile.ts ../doc/examples/test-complex-imports/extreme-test/circular-simple/a.hql ../doc/examples/test-complex-imports/circular-simple-output.js && deno run -A ../doc/examples/test-complex-imports/circular-simple-output.js
tasks.test-import: deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ../doc/examples/import.hql && deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ../doc/examples/macro-import-default-module.hql && deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ../doc/examples/macro-import-name-space.hql && deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ../doc/examples/dependency-test/macro-a.hql && deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ../doc/examples/dependency-test2/a.hql
tasks.test-import2: deno run -A ./src/common/clean-cache.ts --force && deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ../doc/examples/import-test/base.hql && deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ../doc/examples/import-test/direct-js-import.hql && deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ../doc/examples/import-test/export-lib.hql && deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ../doc/examples/import-test/export-test.hql && deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ../doc/examples/import-test/hyphen-test.hql
tasks.test-extreme-imports-simple: deno run -A ./src/common/clean-cache.ts --force && deno run -A ./cli/transpile.ts ../doc/examples/test-complex-imports/extreme-test-simple/entry.hql ../doc/examples/test-complex-imports/extreme-simple-output.js && deno run -A ../doc/examples/test-complex-imports/extreme-simple-output.js
tasks.test-circular-deps: deno run -A ./src/common/clean-cache.ts --force && deno run -A ./cli/transpile.ts ../doc/examples/test-complex-imports/extreme-test/circular/a.hql ../doc/examples/test-complex-imports/circular-output.js && deno run -A ../doc/examples/test-complex-imports/circular-output.js
tasks.test-ts-import: deno run -A ./src/common/clean-cache.ts --force && deno run -A ./cli/transpile.ts ../doc/examples/ts-import-test/entry2.hql ../doc/examples/ts-import-test/output2.js && deno run -A ../doc/examples/ts-import-test/output2.js
